dt: {bc}characterized by enthusiasm and vigorous pursuit {bc}very eager and enthusiastic
{bc}desirous to the point of greed {bc}urgently eager {bc}{sx|greedy||}

pt: {sc}eager{/sc} {sc}avid{/sc} {sc}keen{/sc} {sc}anxious{/sc} {sc}athirst{/sc} mean moved by a strong and urgent desire or interest. {sc}eager{/sc} implies ardor and enthusiasm and sometimes impatience at delay or restraint.
{sc}avid{/sc} adds to {sc}eager{/sc} the implication of insatiability or greed.
{sc}keen{/sc} suggests intensity of interest and quick responsiveness in action.
{sc}anxious{/sc} emphasizes fear of frustration or failure or disappointment.

pt.t: {it}anxious{/it} not to make a social blunder

pt: {sc}athirst{/sc} stresses yearning but not necessarily readiness for action.

et: French or Latin; French {it}avide{/it}, from Latin {it}avidus{/it}, from {it}avēre{/it} to desire, crave; akin to Welsh {it}ewyllys{/it} desire, Old Irish {it}con-oí{/it} he protects
shortdef: characterized by enthusiasm and vigorous pursuit : very eager and enthusiastic
desirous to the point of greed : urgently eager : greedy
